author: Ariel Schalit and Ilan Ben Zion / AP
title: After Ignoring Warnings, Israeli Ultra-Orthodox Communities Hit by Coronavirus
description: Early this week, residents of Bnei Brak, obeying their religious leaders, ignored pleas to stay home in the face of the coronavirus threat
content:
(BNEI BRAK, Israel) — Early this week, the streets of the central Israeli city of Bnei Brak were bustling with shoppers as ultra-Orthodox residents, obeying their religious leaders, ignored pleas to stay home in the face of the coronavirus threat.
By Friday,… [+5903 chars]
